# PropertySetInfo.Get method

Resolve a property from its name within a set, given an schema. Both property set name and property name are case sensitive matches.

```csharp
public static IPropertyTypeInfo? Get(IfcSchemaVersions version, string propertySetName, 
    string propertyName)
```

## Return Value

Property metadata if exact match or null.
